title: How to Fake a Call on an Android Phone

steps.title: Search for a fake call app like Fake Call Me from the Play Store app on your Android phone.
steps.content: Search for a fake call app like Fake Call Me from the Play Store app on your Android phone. Any fake call app should work.

steps.title: Hit the "install" button to install the Fake Call app on your Android.
steps.content: Hit the "install" button to install the Fake Call app on your Android. hit "Open" to open the app when ready.

steps.title: Click "Agree" to the service agreement after reading it over carefully.
steps.content: Click "Agree" to the service agreement after reading it over carefully.

steps.title: Hit the menu button in the Call Me app and select "Settings" to change the ringtone and vibrate settings for your fake calls.
steps.content: Hit the menu button in the Call Me app and select "Settings" to change the ringtone and vibrate settings for your fake calls.

steps.title: Type in the "Caller" and "Number" info at the top of the screen.
steps.content: Type in the "Caller" and "Number" info at the top of the screen. Select the delay you want under "When to call." hit "Call Me" to have the fake call come in after the number of delayed seconds you chose.
